name: MathsTurboTanks
description:
Use your tank to blank the correct answer on the enemy target ..... hit the wrong target and the enemy tanks will attack you!  Try to achieve the highest score before your health drops to zero.

An educational maths game built in honour of the brilliant Unity Tanks tutorial.  Sound effects and background music from the excellent FreeSFX site.

My mission: to develop 3D video games which bring learning maths to life.
